content:
option "title" "Browser Demo Ledger"
option "operating_currency" "CNY"
option "operating_currency" "USD"
option "operating_currency" "EUR"
option "operating_currency" "HKD"
option "operating_currency" "JPY"

include "commodities.bean"
include "accounts.bean"
include "prices.bean"
include "transactions.bean"
include "balances.bean"

2024-01-01 open Assets:Bank:Checking             CNY
2024-01-01 open Assets:Bank:Savings              USD
2024-01-01 open Assets:Cash:Wallet               CNY
2024-01-01 open Assets:Brokerage:IBKR            USD, VTI
2024-01-01 open Assets:Brokerage:Schwab          USD
2024-01-01 open Assets:Crypto:Exchange           BTC
2024-01-01 open Assets:Crypto:ColdWallet         BTC
2024-01-01 open Liabilities:CreditCard:Visa      CNY
2024-01-01 open Liabilities:Loan:Mortgage        CNY
2024-01-01 open Income:Salary                    CNY
2024-01-01 open Income:Bonus                     CNY
2024-01-01 open Income:Dividends                 USD
2024-01-01 open Expenses:Rent                    CNY
2024-01-01 open Expenses:Food:Groceries          CNY
2024-01-01 open Expenses:Food:Dining             CNY
2024-01-01 open Expenses:Transport               CNY
2024-01-01 open Expenses:Travel                  USD
2024-01-01 open Expenses:Health                  CNY
2024-01-01 open Expenses:Education               CNY
2024-01-01 open Expenses:Fees:FX                 CNY
2024-01-01 open Expenses:Interest:Mortgage        CNY
2024-01-01 open Expenses:Cash:Untracked           CNY
2024-01-01 open Equity:Opening-Balances

2024-01-01 * "Opening Balances" "Bank Checking"
  Assets:Bank:Checking                   52000.00 CNY
  Equity:Opening-Balances

2024-01-01 * "Opening Balances" "USD Savings"
  Assets:Bank:Savings                    12000.00 USD
  Equity:Opening-Balances

2024-01-01 * "Opening Balances" "Cash Wallet"
  Assets:Cash:Wallet                       850.00 CNY
  Equity:Opening-Balances

2024-01-01 * "Opening Balances" "IBKR Cash"
  Assets:Brokerage:IBKR                   5000.00 USD
  Equity:Opening-Balances

2024-01-01 * "Opening Balances" "Schwab Cash"
  Assets:Brokerage:Schwab                 3200.00 USD
  Equity:Opening-Balances

2024-01-01 * "Opening Balances" "BTC on Exchange"
  Assets:Crypto:Exchange                     0.50 BTC
  Equity:Opening-Balances

2024-01-01 * "Opening Balances" "BTC Cold Wallet"
  Assets:Crypto:ColdWallet                   1.25 BTC
  Equity:Opening-Balances

2024-01-01 * "Opening Balances" "Credit Card"
  Liabilities:CreditCard:Visa            -3500.00 CNY
  Equity:Opening-Balances

2024-01-01 * "Opening Balances" "Mortgage"
  Liabilities:Loan:Mortgage           -1200000.00 CNY
  Equity:Opening-Balances

2024-01-31 * "ACME Corp" "Salary"
  Assets:Bank:Checking                   35000.00 CNY
  Income:Salary                         -35000.00 CNY

2024-02-01 * "Landlord" "Rent (Feb)"
  Expenses:Rent                           6500.00 CNY
  Assets:Bank:Checking                    -6500.00 CNY

2024-02-03 * "Hema Fresh" "Groceries"
  Expenses:Food:Groceries                  420.50 CNY
  Assets:Cash:Wallet                      -420.50 CNY

2024-02-05 * "Metro" "Transit Card"
  Expenses:Transport                       200.00 CNY
  Assets:Bank:Checking                     -200.00 CNY

2024-02-06 * "Restaurant" "Dinner"
  Expenses:Food:Dining                     198.00 CNY
  Liabilities:CreditCard:Visa             -198.00 CNY

2024-02-08 * "Pharmacy" "Medicine"
  Expenses:Health                           86.30 CNY
  Assets:Bank:Checking                      -86.30 CNY

2024-02-10 * "Bank" "Mortgage Payment"
  Liabilities:Loan:Mortgage                5000.00 CNY
  Expenses:Interest:Mortgage               2200.00 CNY
  Assets:Bank:Checking                    -7200.00 CNY

2024-02-25 * "Bank" "Visa Payment"
  Liabilities:CreditCard:Visa             3500.00 CNY
  Assets:Bank:Checking                    -3500.00 CNY

2024-02-29 * "ACME Corp" "Salary"
  Assets:Bank:Checking                   35000.00 CNY
  Income:Salary                         -35000.00 CNY

2024-02-29 * "ACME Corp" "Performance Bonus"
  Assets:Bank:Checking                    8000.00 CNY
  Income:Bonus                           -8000.00 CNY

2024-03-01 * "Landlord" "Rent (Mar)"
  Expenses:Rent                           6500.00 CNY
  Assets:Bank:Checking                    -6500.00 CNY

2024-03-15 * "Bank" "Exchange CNY to USD"
  Assets:Bank:Savings                     1000.00 USD @ 7.20 CNY
  Assets:Bank:Checking                    -7220.00 CNY
  Expenses:Fees:FX                          20.00 CNY

2024-03-20 * "Airline" "Flight"
  Expenses:Travel                          420.00 USD
  Assets:Bank:Savings                     -420.00 USD

2024-03-22 * "Coursera" "Online Course"
  Expenses:Education                       399.00 CNY
  Assets:Bank:Checking                     -399.00 CNY

2024-03-23 * "Carrefour" "Groceries"
  Expenses:Food:Groceries                  380.20 CNY
  Assets:Cash:Wallet                      -380.20 CNY

2024-03-25 * "ATM" "Cash Withdrawal"
  Assets:Cash:Wallet                      1000.00 CNY
  Assets:Bank:Checking                    -1000.00 CNY

2024-03-26 * "Exchange" "Buy BTC"
  Assets:Crypto:Exchange                     0.10 BTC {200000.00 CNY}
  Assets:Bank:Checking                   -20000.00 CNY

2024-03-27 * "Exchange" "Transfer BTC to Cold Wallet"
  Assets:Crypto:ColdWallet                  0.10 BTC
  Assets:Crypto:Exchange                   -0.10 BTC

2024-03-28 * "IBKR" "Buy VTI"
  Assets:Brokerage:IBKR                    10 VTI {250.00 USD}
  Assets:Bank:Savings                    -2500.00 USD

2024-03-30 * "Cafe" "Coffee"
  Expenses:Food:Dining                      38.00 CNY
  Liabilities:CreditCard:Visa              -38.00 CNY

2024-03-31 * "Bank" "Visa Payment"
  Liabilities:CreditCard:Visa              236.00 CNY
  Assets:Bank:Checking                     -236.00 CNY

2024-03-31 * "IBKR" "Dividend"
  Assets:Brokerage:IBKR                     15.00 USD
  Income:Dividends                         -15.00 USD

2024-03-30 pad Assets:Cash:Wallet Expenses:Cash:Untracked
2024-03-31 balance Assets:Cash:Wallet          900.00 CNY

2024-01-01 price USD 7.10 CNY
2024-01-01 price EUR 7.80 CNY
2024-01-01 price HKD 0.90 CNY
2024-01-01 price JPY 0.048 CNY
2024-01-01 price BTC 210000.00 CNY
2024-03-28 price VTI 252.00 USD
2024-03-31 price VTI 255.00 USD

2024-01-01 commodity BTC
2024-01-01 commodity CNY
2024-01-01 commodity USD
2024-01-01 commodity EUR
2024-01-01 commodity HKD
2024-01-01 commodity JPY
2024-01-01 commodity VTI
